sas2spark documentation
=======================

Welcome to sas2spark's documentation!
====================================

`sas2spark` is a Python package designed to provide similar functionality
to common SAS procedures for users working with Pandas or PySpark DataFrames.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   introduction
   api
